AD.name: Required Camel Components
AD.description: A comma separated list of Camel components which are required in order to start up this setup (e.g. amqp, stream)

AD.name: Required Camel Languages
AD.description: A comma separated list of Camel languages which are required in order to start up this setup (e.g. javaScript)

AD.name: Cloud Service Mappings
AD.description: A comma separated list of entries in the format name=filter or name=kura-pid, mapping cloud service instances to component names. (e.g. cloud=org.eclipse.kura.cloud.CloudService)

AD.name: JavaScript init code
AD.description: JavaScript code which is called when the router is initialized first. The camel context is available in the variable 'camelContext'.|TextArea

AD.name: Disable JMX
AD.description: Disable the JMX integration for this Camel context
